resources.string: EEOI is one of the parameters to evaluate the voyage efficiency expressed in the form of CO2 emitted per unit of transport work. This application is based on the EEOI guidelines by IMO (International Maritime Organization). This application DOES NOT 100% accurate, detailed calculation must be done for better result. This application aims to achieve the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions from ships in operation, particularly container ships.
1. Acquire the data from the database (AIS database, Ship Registers, Fleet Company).\n 2. Fill the variables based on the data.\n 3. Click generate, and then it generates the EEOI values.
